content: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
author: Oscar Wilde

content: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

content: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

content: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

content: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

content: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

content: I think when you wake up everyday, you get the chance to think of what you want to do with your day. And what you want to put into the world that day and who you want to be. Be a lover. Choose Love. Give love. Love everyone always. Yeah always.
author: Harry Styles

content: When life gets you down, do you wanna know what youâ€™ve gotta do? Just keep swimming.
author: Dori, Finding Nemo

content: With great power comes great responsibility.
author: Spider-Man

content: As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.
author: John Green, The Fault in Our Stars

content: I solemnly swear that I am up to no good.
author: J.K. Rowling, Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

content: 'You love me. Real or not real?'</br> I tell him, 'Real.'
author: Suzanne Collins, Mockingjay

content: The greatness of a nation and its moral progress can be judged by the way its animals are treated.
author: Mahatma Gandhi
